long_description: The Saucony Peregrine 4 Trail-Running Shoes have become a favorite of trail runners for their versatility and low-profile feel. The outsoles feature an aggressive lug design for superior traction. Lightweight yet strong FlexFilm material reduces layers in the uppers for a seamless, flexible feel. Midsoles effectively center the feet, absorb impacts and distribute pressure, resulting in an exceptionally smooth and responsive ride. Upgraded rock plates made of nylon fiber mesh are more flexible and lighter than previous designs, yet still protect against sharp objects on the trail. Gusseted tongues help keep debris out of the shoes. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Multi-directional lug design offers exceptional traction on many types of terrain. Saucony Peregrine 4 Trail-Running Shoes are compatible with gaiters (sold separately).
